attributes.action: Immediately grant British Citizenship to Tul Bahadar Pun, a man who fought for this country and won the VC.  Further, that the Government pay for his travel and settlement in the UK as he justly deserves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tul Bahadar Pun is a former Gurkha who fought for the British in Burma, winning the VC for conspicuous gallantry.  After his loyal service the British Government has cast him on the scrap heap and is refusing him the right to live in Britain.
At a time when so many undeserving people are allowed to come and live here it is nothing short of a national disgrace that people who were willing to fight and die to protect our way of life should be thrown aside once their usefulness is outlived.  We should hang our heads in shame.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
